channel.title: CTF on multiplex3r.github.io
channel.description: Recent content in CTF on multiplex3r.github.io

item.title: CTF mode activate!
item.description: I love CTF’s! And I love my MBP. So it’s logical to assume that I love CTFing from my MBP. These are some *cough opsec* of the things I do to secure my MBP when I’m attached to a CTF network. You could use these tips to help you harden your $(laptop of choice) when you’re connected to any potentially hostile network.
